test-name.description: The name of the test case, usually matches the file name without extension.

description.description: English description of the test case.

requires.description: List of features required by the test case.

prologue.description: Initialization to perform prior to stepping through the test-case actions.

actions.description: A sequence of actions to perform.

epilogue.description: Finalization to perform after stepping through the test-case actions.
